summary: Replaces the covers of Alteration, Destruction, Conjuration, Illusion and Restoration skill books.
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER]BETTER LOOKING SKILL BOOK COVERS[/CENTER]



Info
----------------
It always bothered me that magic skill books looked more like spell tomes than actual books.

Well, this mod changes that. It replaces the covers of Alteration, Destruction, Conjuration, Illusion and Restoration skill books with random book covers from the original game. 


Installation
----------------
Copy BookCoverReplacer.esp into your Data folder.
author: Freedon Nadd
